actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee Filed by Kindness. Discharge Petition No: 06.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 3, to provide for the appointment of United States bankruptcy judges under Article III of the Constitution, and for other purposes, and making in order certain amendments, including the texts of the bills H.R. 3257 and H.R. 1800.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3 (bankruptcy courts and judges).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 3, to provide for the appointment of United States bankruptcy judges under Article III of the Constitution, and for other purposes, and making in order certain amendments, including the texts of the bills H.R. 3257 and H.R. 1800.
